title: Airline Samples
description:
Unidentified but possibly PanAm fabric in various weaves, blue & brown. Nos. 6 - 13 are more boldly woven patterns in plain & plaid. half is bright blue/small 1\" squarea. Other hald is faded blue-brown. small, 1\" squares
could be reversible/ #s along lft selvedge:  FE110-218 (brt, blue, small square)
